name: Ripe
description:
Ripe is a 5-12 minute visual novel/rpg maker game. It's super CUTE!  You take the role of a young Tomatoe in this creepy, spooky, and CUTE coming of age game.  Young Tomatoe must go through 3 trials in order to ripen up, and achieve adulthood.  However Tomatoe can't do it without your help! Please lend Tomatoe a helping hand.

Youtube link is a playthrough of the game
